DPRK FM Meets Iranian and Mongolian Ambassadors 
   Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, respectively met and had a talk with Morteza Moradian, new Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar, new Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, when they paid a courtesy call on him on May 19.

DPRK Ambassador to Democratic Congo Appointed 
   Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- According to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jo Man Sok was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Democratic Congo.

Iranian Friendship Delegation Arrives 
   Pyongyang, May 19 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of Hamedan Province of Iran led by Deputy Governor Akbar Abedi arrived here today by air.

Organos y entidades sociales de Corea expresan condolencias a los chinos danados
   Pyongyang, 19 de mayo (ATCC) -- Con motivo de que el fuerte terremoto que azoto el dia 12 el distrito de Wenchuan de la provincia de Sichuan de China causo grandes perdidas humanas y materiales, el Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, el Comite Central de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-China , el CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista  Kim Il Sung y otros organos y entidades sociales enviaron telegramas de consuelo a las entidades correspondientes de China para expresar profundas condolencias a los habitantes de zonas afectadas.
